trans-unit.source: Wraps the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> class, it to be placed as a subelement of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il wrapping di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"> </xref> (classe), da inserire come sottoelemento del <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The KeyInfoEncryptedKey class wraps the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class, which allows you to add the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class as a subelement of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: La classe KeyInfoEncryptedKey esegue il wrapping della <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>classe, che consente di aggiungere la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>classe come sottoelemento di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>

trans-unit.source: Initialize the KeyInfoEncryptedKey class to an instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class when you need to add an encrypted session key to your encrypted XML document.
trans-unit.target: Inizializzare la classe KeyInfoEncryptedKey a un'istanza del <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>classe quando è necessario aggiungere una chiave di sessione crittografata al documento XML crittografato.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey> class using an instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore non inizializza la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey>classe utilizza un'istanza di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey.EncryptedKey%2A> property to specify an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object when you use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey.EncryptedKey%2A>proprietà per specificare un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>quando si utilizza questo costruttore dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey.EncryptedKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"> </xref> classe utilizzando un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> object that encapsulates an encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"> </xref> oggetto che incapsula una chiave crittografata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> object that encapsulates an encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"> </xref> oggetto che incapsula una chiave crittografata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey> class wraps the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class, which allows you to add the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class as a subelement of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey>classe esegue il wrapping della <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>classe, che consente di aggiungere la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>classe come sottoelemento di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey>

trans-unit.source: Use the EncryptedKey property to access the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class contained within the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey> class.

trans-unit.source: Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"></xref> object to match.
trans-unit.target: Analizza l'input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> dell'oggetto e configura lo stato interno del <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"> </xref> oggetto in modo che corrispondano.
